title: Agile Engineering Program Manager
summary: At Claris, an Apple Company, we are dedicated to empowering problem solvers, enabling them to imagine, design, and create innovative solutions. We give them a platform that lets them do the hard things their users need, affordably and relatively quickly. Focus on future-oriented technologies and commitment to advancing creative potential.
description: This role requires advanced experience in Agile frameworks with practical experience in an Agile role at either the program or team level with demonstrated ability to adopt Agile values, principles, mentality, practices, and methodologies.
key_qualifications: 3+ years serving as a Scrum Master across multiple Agile teams in an Agile environment, preferably applying Scrum@Scale. Engineering Project Management expertise driving value delivery throughout a Software Development Life Cycle in an Agile methodology.
education_experience:
-  Registered Scrum Master (RSM), Certified ScrumMaster (CSM) or Professional Scrum Master (PSM I) certification required, with additional certifications such as RAC, RSM@S, RS@SP, A-CSM, PSM II, or other Scrum@Scale credentials preferred.
-  Degree in Computer Science, Engineering, Mathematics, or other relevant field preferred or equivalent practical experience
pay_benefits:
